name: Baku Botanical Garden
description: A calm, leafy escape inside the city with shaded paths, benches, and seasonal colors—perfect for slow walks and photos.

name: Maiden Tower (Qız Qalası)
description: Baku’s iconic 12th-century stone tower in the Old City. Climb to the top for views over Icherisheher and the Caspian Sea.

name: Heydar Aliyev Center
description: Zaha Hadid’s flowing, futuristic landmark. The museum and gallery host design, culture, and tech exhibits in a stunning space.

name: Old City (Icherisheher)
description: UNESCO-listed heart of Baku with narrow lanes, caravanserais, and stone houses—best explored on foot with plenty of photo stops.

name: Flame Towers
description: Three glass towers that light up the skyline at night with animated LEDs—Baku’s most modern postcard view.
